isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLE: INTERNATIONAL - ASSEMBLE

svcproc.title: OUTPUT SHAFT
svcproc.para: Clean and inspect output shaft, thick spacer, yoke, and washer. Replace if excessive wear or damage is detected.

step1.para: Position thick spacer onto the shaft against the machined shoulder.
Brush grease on new bearing cups and cones for prelube and place both into the bearing retainer with the split inner spacer between them.

note.para: To insure proper end play, both inner and outer bearings are in matched sets with spacers. Do not mix!

step1.para: Install subassembly onto the output shaft, using a press and the adapter ( Figure 26).

figure.caption: Figure 26. Install Subassembly Onto Output Shaft

caution.para: Use only enough pressure to lightly seat bearings against the thick spacer. Excessive pressure could damage the assembly.

step1.para: Install new seal using seal installer tool number ZTSE 4273-5, and handle number ZTSE 4273-1A. Refer to SPECIAL TOOLS.
Install yoke using installer tool number ZTSE 4335 and place washer onto shaft. To insure clamp load, use Loctite #680 on the threads of the nut and torque to 500 to 600 ft-lbs. (678 to 813 N•m).

Clean mating surfaces on axle housing and output shaft bearing retainer. Apply a 1/16" bead of Loctite 518 gasket eliminator on housing mounting flange and around bolt holes. Install output shaft, with lube trough to bottom ( Figure 27). Tighten mounting bolts evenly to 30 to 40 ft-lbs. (41 to 55 N•m).
